DateOfMovies - Class in movies.classes.dateOfMovies
This class is to the date attribute of movies
DateOfMovies() - Constructor for class movies.classes.dateOfMovies.DateOfMovies

DateOfMovies(int, int, int) - Constructor for class movies.classes.dateOfMovies.DateOfMovies
This constructor is to set movie's date if day,month and year are given

Movie - Interface in movies.interfaces

S

Serie - Interface in movies.interfaces
This interface is for Series In this case I use this interace to manage all kind of Series This interface is inherited from Movies because it has all the characteristics to be considered like that
setDate(DateOfMovies) - Method in interface movies.interfaces.Movie
set attributes for movie's date and
setDay(int) - Method in class movies.classes.dateOfMovies.DateOfMovies
this method is to set day of movie's date if day is less than zero or greater than 31 it will be set as the default day which is the current day
setGenre(String) - Method in interface movies.interfaces.Movie
set attribute for movie's genre
setHours(int) - Method in class movies.classes.dateOfMovies.TimeOfMovies
method to set Hours of Movie If it equal or higher than zero or equal or lower than four so set given value if it's not between those values set zero as default
setMinutes(int) - Method in class movies.classes.dateOfMovies.TimeOfMovies
method to get remaining minutes besides hours of movie for example a movie can last 1 hours and 20 minutes the remaining minutes are 20 of movie's time
setMonth(int) - Method in class movies.classes.dateOfMovies.DateOfMovies
this method is to set month of movie's date if given parameter is less than zero or higher than 13 the month will be set as today's month

setTitle(String) - Method in interface movies.interfaces.Movie

setYear(int) - Method in class movies.classes.dateOfMovies.DateOfMovies
this method is to set year of movie's date if the year is less than 1999 the year will be set as today´s year
